assumptions: latex text stating any domain/variable/constraint assumptions.

steps.step: short and concise latex description of the action/rule used.
steps.expression: resulting latex expression after applying the action/rule.
steps.justification: optional brief latex note naming the theorem/property/identity/rule used. e.g. (u-substitution)

final_answer: one latex sentence concluding the result

verification.method: latex description of how you checked

checks.residual_or_truth: latex showing substitution or inequality truth

extraneous_solutions: list any discarded solutions in latex

formats.exact: exact latex form (keep radicals/fractions, rationalize denominators)
formats.interval_notation: if inequality/domain, interval notation in latex

notes: optional latex remarks about special cases/branches/considerations
